Package silverlib.music

Class MusicLibrary

  • java.lang.Object
    • silverlib.music.MusicLibrary
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class MusicLibrary
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MusicLibrary​(java.io.File[] midiFiles, java.lang.String[] songNames, java.lang.String name)
      Initializes a MusicLibrary from a list of MIDI files
      MusicLibrary​(java.lang.String[] paths, java.lang.String name)
      Initializes a MusicLibrary from a list of file paths for .sng files that conform to the format described at https://silordoflight.github.io/silverlib/javaDoc/SongFormat.html

    • Constructor Detail

      • MusicLibrary

        public MusicLibrary​(java.lang.String[] paths,
                    java.lang.String name)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException
        Initializes a MusicLibrary from a list of file paths for .sng files that conform to the format described at https://silordoflight.github.io/silverlib/javaDoc/SongFormat.html
        Parameters:
        paths - A list of absolute file paths for the song sources
        name - The name of this library
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If loading fails
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException - If sequencing fails
        Since:
        1.10.4

      • MusicLibrary

        public MusicLibrary​(java.io.File[] midiFiles,
                    java.lang.String[] songNames,
                    java.lang.String name)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException
        Initializes a MusicLibrary from a list of MIDI files
        Parameters:
        midiFiles - A list of absolute file paths for the song sources
        songNames - A list of song names
        name - The name of this library
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If loading fails
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException - If sequencing fails
        Since:
        1.10.4
